typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	File as string ('entry_1201.json'),
	Directory as string,
	ExecutionDate as timestamp,
	RunId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	format: 'parquet') ~> StructuredFile
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	partitionRootPath: ($Directory),
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat($Directory, '/*/*/*/*.parquet'))]) ~> CurrentLookup
StructuredFile derive(HASH = md5(columns()),
		ExecutionStatus = 'INSERT',
		ExecutionCreatedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionModifiedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionLogId = $RunId) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns, Select1 exists(HASH == HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
CurrentLookup select(mapColumn(
		FileName,
		each(match( locate('HASH', lower(name)) == 1),
			'HASH' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[($File)],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CurrentSink
